clinical_study.brief_title: Motor Control in Chronic Fatigue Syndrome and Fibromyalgia
clinical_study.official_title: Motor Control in Chronic Fatigue Syndrome and Fibromyalgia.

lead_sponsor.agency: Norwegian University of Science and Technology

clinical_study.source: Norwegian University of Science and Technology

brief_summary.textblock: This project is a comprehensive study, with main focus on motor control, comparing patients with chronic fatigue syndrome / myalgic encephalopathy (CFS/ME) and/or fibromyalgia syndrome (FMS). Focus of the present project will be on detailed movement analysis in a movement laboratory and involve functional tasks such as walking and standing. Investigations will also comprise muscle activity, reaction time and fine motor control.

study_pop.textblock: Patients with chronic fatigue syndrome and fibromyalgia from primary care clinics.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosis of chronic fatigue syndrome or fibromyalgia
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients who already had been treated.
